item.title: 2. Documentation
item.description: State: Draft To do Github repositories Github actons Hugo deployment process Mermaid sequencediagram Deployment process This diagram shows the deployment process. sequenceDiagram participant A as Laptop@local participant B as blog-source@github participant C as blog-rendered@github A-A: Create new blog content A-B: Push code to Github upstream repository (blog-source@github) Note over B: Commit action (push) will trigger "Github Actions" B-C: Push static html from source repo to Github pages via a "
